thread.title: Affordable and clean place- worth the distance from main attractions
thread.title_full: Affordable and clean place- worth the distance from main attractions - Review of Hotel De La Paix Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ser R
title: Affordable and clean place- worth the distance from main attractions
text:
I was looking for an affordable, clean and decent hotel - after reading many reviews I decided to give it a try to this hotel. I was a little hesitant due to the distance and transportation to the main areas however having a metro station in the corner and others at 1 or 2 blocks was a plus and it was not an issue. When we hanged out until very late we took an Uber from Notre Dame to the hotel and was around 12-15 Euros. The surrounds were nice, different options of restaurants, a good boulangerie in the corner (coffee/bread shop) and in general the area looked safe. Very good service in the front desk, small rooms (as many in Paris), very clean/modern style restroom, very small elevator (2 persons capacity top-no luggage) but it was not an issue. In general a good place to stay - have the basics- if your plan is to have a place to sleep in a clean and nice area.
